title: 又是搭建forge开发环境失败的问题
author: thestronger
txt_content:
错误信息如下，我都已经开了VPN了：

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Could not resolve all dependencies for configuration ':forgeGradleMcpMappings'.
> Could not resolve de.oceanlabs.mcp:mcp_stable:20-1.8.8.
  Required by:
      com.yourname.modid:forge-1.8.9:1.0
   > Could not resolve de.oceanlabs.mcp:mcp_stable:20-1.8.8.
      > Could not get resource 'http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/de/oceanlabs/mcp/mcp_stable/20-1.8.8/mcp_stable-20-1.8.8.pom'.
         > Could not GET 'http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/de/oceanlabs/mcp/mcp_stable/20-1.8.8/mcp_stable-20-1.8.8.pom'.
            > Software caused connection abort: connect
   > Could not resolve de.oceanlabs.mcp:mcp_stable:20-1.8.8.
      > Could not get resource 'https://libraries.minecraft.net/de/oceanlabs/mcp/mcp_stable/20-1.8.8/mcp_stable-20-1.8.8.pom'.
         > Could not GET 'https://libraries.minecraft.net/de/oceanlabs/mcp/mcp_stable/20-1.8.8/mcp_stable-20-1.8.8.pom'. Received status code 403 from server: Forbidden

* Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output.


BUILD FAILED

Total time: 3 mins 0.259 secs

replies.author: 3TUSK
replies.txt_content:
两个可能：
0.这个VPN不好使（可能性不大）
1.你的build.gradle有问题。（个人倾向于这个可能性）

replies.author: thestronger
replies.txt_content:
u.s.knowledge 发表于 2017-1-6 05:58
两个可能：
0.这个VPN不好使（可能性不大）
1.你的build.gradle有问题。（个人倾向于这个可能性） ...
唉，不搞了，下载了这个http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=646145，可以直接用了
